label: A3B_hP24_194_hk_bf-002
title: Hexagonal PuAl$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
PuAl$_{3}$ can also be found in a rhombohedral form which is isostructural with \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_hR12_166_ac_eh-001}{BaPb$_{3}$}. (Runnals, 1965) 
 Hexagonal PuAl$_{3}$ and \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_hP24_194_hk_bf-001}{VCo$_{3}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, A3B\_hP24\_194\_hk\_bf.  They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
